Developer documentationJira Cloud platform
12 de set. de 2021
Personalised quick-add buttons - buttons for adding attachments, subtasks, and linked issues. If the quick-add button for an app isn’t frequently used, it’s shown in an overflow menu (•••) next to the other quick-add buttons.Well-designed apps that follow our best practices should see more repeat engagement from Jira users.

t.jwt(opts)
Developer documentationTrello
11 de nov. de 2021
Asynchronously request a signed JWT from Trello for the current member.window.TrelloPowerUp.initialize({ 'board-buttons': async function (t, opts) { if (t.isMemberSignedIn()) { const jwt = await t.jwt({ state: JSON.stringify({ hello: 'world' }), }); console.log(jwt); } return []; } });If you checked the console you would find a JWT like:eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZFBsdWdpbiI6IjVlNjY3ODRjNjA2Y2IxMTYwYThmNWRjMCIsImlkQm9hcmQiOiI1ZTY2NzgxMTYwNmNiMTE2MGE4ZjViZjciLCJpZE1lbWJlciI6IjVlNjQ1ZGMyYzQyMDVlMTQxNjIxODQwNCIsInN0YXRlIjoidGVzdCIsImlhdCI6MTU4Mzg1ODY2OCwiZXhwIjoxNTgzODU5NTY4LCJpc3MiOiJ0cmVsbG8ifQ
CLOUD

description:
Como usuario
  Eu quero  acessar a area de pesquisa
  Para que eu possa pesquisar sobre determinado assunto

steps.name: Dado  que acsesso a area de desenvolvedores
Quando  clico em search digitando o assunto
Entao  visualizo o resultado da pesquisa
